entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
